data.title: Southwest Airlines Operating Income 2010-2024 | LUV
data.meta_description:
Southwest Airlines annual/quarterly operating income history and growth rate from 2010 to 2024. Operating income can be defined as income after operating expenses have been deducted and before interest payments and taxes have been deducted.
  • Southwest Airlines operating income for the quarter ending March 31, 2024 was $-0.393B, a 38.38% increase year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines operating income for the twelve months ending March 31, 2024 was $115M, a 86.99% decline year-over-year.
  • Southwest Airlines annual operating income for 2023 was $0.224B, a 77.97% decline from 2022.
  • Southwest Airlines annual operating income for 2022 was $1.017B, a 40.91% decline from 2021.
  • Southwest Airlines annual operating income for 2021 was $1.721B, a 145.1% decline from 2020.
